front.title: A DANE Record and DNSSEC Authentication Chain Extension for TLS

abstract.t: This draft describes a new TLS extension for transport of a DNS record set serialized with the DNSSEC signatures needed to authenticate that record set. The intent of this proposal is to allow TLS clients to perform DANE authentication of a TLS server without needing to perform additional DNS record lookups. It is not intended to be used to validate the TLS server's address records.
